User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:2.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0.1
Build Identifier: https://donate.mozilla.org/page/contribute/protect-the-web

Some countries do not have a zip code. The Join Web form has this as a mandatory field. A Mozilla Supporter suggested that we only make it a mandatory field for countries that require a zip code.

Reproducible: Didn't try
